scripts.clean: node -e "require('fs').rmSync('dist', {recursive: true, force: true}); require('fs').rmSync('node_modules/.vite', {recursive: true, force: true}); require('fs').rmSync('node_modules/.tmp', {recursive: true, force: true})"
scripts.clean:all: node -e "require('fs').rmSync('node_modules', {recursive: true, force: true}); require('fs').rmSync('package-lock.json', {force: true}); require('fs').rmSync('dist', {recursive: true, force: true})"
